```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
full_data <- read_excel("cy_2014_ofo_inadmissibles_redacted.xlsx")
library(lubridate)
```
```{r}
# Cleaning the data
full_data <- full_data |>
  janitor::clean_names()

data_no_duplicates <- full_data |>
  filter(is.na(duplicate_subject_indicator))

clean_data <- data_no_duplicates |>
  mutate(event_created_datetime = ymd_hms(event_created_datetime)) |>
  mutate(month = month(event_created_datetime)) |>
  mutate(month_name = month(event_created_datetime, label = TRUE, abbr = FALSE))
```
